title: Roil
description: Shale is in trouble - the creature-filled darkness known as the Roil is expanding, consuming the land, swallowing cities whole. Where once there were 12 metropolises, now only 4 remain.It's up to a drug addict, an old man and a woman bent on revenge to try to save their city - and the world.File Fantasy [ End Of The World | The Darkness Approaches | Addiction | On The Edge ]e-book 9780857661852
author: Trent Jamieson
